title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not available.
EB: The Open Project and Close Project menu items should both be available when selecting multiple projects.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Create two projects P1 and P2. Select P2 and attempt to close it.
